question: 中望3D的API有什么接口能拿到模型的所有实体ID吗？
llama-7b:
In CAD-related terminology, "中望3D" refers to ZWCAD, a popular CAD software.

According to the ZWCAD API documentation, you can use the `IGePart` interface to get the entity IDs of all entities in a 3D model.

Specifically, you can use the `GetEntityIds` method of the `IGePart` interface to retrieve an array of entity IDs.

Here's an example code snippet in C#:
```csharp
using ZWCADPlatform;

// assume'model' is an instance of IGePart

int[] entityIds = model.GetEntityIds();
```
This will give you an array of entity IDs, which you can then use to access individual entities in the 3D model.

Note that the `IGePart` interface is part of the ZWCAD API, and you'll need to have a good understanding of the API documentation and CAD-related concepts to work with it effectively.
